      AssessmentRunNotifierDecorator​(org.junit.runner.notification.RunNotifier delegate, DescriptionResolver descriptionResolver)

      • AssessmentRunNotifierDecorator

        public AssessmentRunNotifierDecorator​(org.junit.runner.notification.RunNotifier delegate,
                                      DescriptionResolver descriptionResolver)
        Construct a new decorator that wraps a RunNotifier to allow AssessmentNotifier events to generate JUnit run notifications.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the JUnit RunNotifier to send events to
        descriptionResolver - the DescriptionResolver to use to determine the assessments JUnit description
